channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 1, 09:00 - 11:00 UTC

May 30, 22:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 01/08/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [ERI1C][VMware Private Cloud] - Datastore maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 28, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 31, 16:00 UTC

Jun 25, 20:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 28/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 31/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SBG2A][Managed vSphere] - Equipment update notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 21, 11:30 - 21:00 UTC

Jun 24, 20:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 21/07/2025 11:30 UTC
End time : 21/07/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, customers may experience a few seconds of slowness when reading from or writing to their datastore.
However, there will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability or virtual machines.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 21, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 24, 16:00 UTC

Jun 25, 20:25 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 21/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 24/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accesible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 15, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 17, 16:00 UTC

Jun 25, 20:24 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 15/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour.
vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [RBX2b][Hosted Private Cloud] - Cluster9684 incident notification
item.description:
Jul 8, 17:41 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere offer has been resolved.

Start time : 08/07/2025 05:48 UTC
End time : 08/07/2025 12:04 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 8, 10:18 UTC
Monitoring - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : We have not observed any disruption since 08/07/2025 10:10 UTC.
Ongoing Actions : Our technical teams is currently monitoring the incident.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 8, 08:56 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Our teams is continuing to work actively on the incident.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 8, 06:56 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our our Managed vSphere offer on the specific RBX2b region.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 08/07/2025 05:48 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Cluster9684 is temporarily unreachable.
Customers Impact : Customers are experiencing malfunctions when they want to access their storage.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 8, 06:23 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our our Managed vSphere offer, which is causing temporary availability issues in Cluster9684.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 08/07/2025 05:48 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Cluster9684 is temporarily unreachable.
Customers Impact : Customers are experiencing malfunctions when they want to access their storage.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. 

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [LIM1][VMware Private Cloud] - Multiple racks
item.description:
Jul 7, 10:08 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that an incident happened on Clusters 6009,6013,6060,6061,6062,6063 and has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 07/07/2025 08:41 UTC
End time : 07/07/2025 08:58 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Clusters 6009,6013,6060,6061,6062,6063 were unreachable
Customers Impact : Customers were experiencing malfunctions when they wanted to access their storage in the specific rack L106B10.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

item.title: [LIM1][VMware Private Cloud] - Multiple racks
item.description:
Jul 7, 09:16 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on Clusters 6009,6013,6060,6061,6062,6063 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 07/07/2025 08:41 UTC
End time : 07/07/2025 08:58 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jul 7, 09:13 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our our our Managed VMware Cloud Director ,which is causing temporary availability issues in the Clusters 6009,6013,6060,6061,6062,6063.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 07/07/2025 08:41 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Clusters 6009,6013,6060,6061,6062,6063 are unreachable
Customers Impact : Customers are experiencing malfunctions when they want to access their storage in the specific rack L106B10.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are working to resolve this incident and restore the service.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 7, 09:05 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director on the clusters 6009,6013,6060,6061,6062,6063
Start time : 07/07/2025 08:41 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
